@@ -0,0 +1,29 @@
+# NOTE: This file has been generated, do not edit
+(common) {
+    encode zstd gzip
+    log {
+        output stdout
+    }
+}
+
+example.org {
+    import common
+    reverse_proxy example-org:80 {
+        header_down +Strict-Transport-Security "max-age=63072000; includeSubDomains; preload"
+    }
+}
+
+example.net {
+    import common
+    redir https://example.org{uri}
+}
+
+www.example.net {
+    import common
+    redir https://example.org{uri}
+}
+
+www.example.org {
+    import common
+    redir https://example.org{uri}
+}

changed=yes comment='Caddyfile changed'
